en_US: I’d heard the Hidden Machine Defog was
somewhere in these ruins.
It’s just that I seem to be lost, what
with everything looking the same.
Now what?
I could use help here.
I’d heard the Hidden Machine Defog was
somewhere in these ruins.
It’s just that I seem to be lost, what
with everything looking the same.
Now what?
I could use help here.
Hey!
Now looky here!
What you have there!
That is the Hidden Machine Defog!
Can you loan it to me real quick?
I’ll make it worth your while.
OK, so I teach my STARAVIA the hidden
move Defog like so... And done!
Thanks! You’re my rescuer! Hahaha!
Here you go, my thanks as promised.
It’s not like it’s going to wear out!
It’s just for a minute! Cheapskate!
I’ve finally got Defog, and it’s all
thanks to you.
I’ll get to climbing the Lost Tower
now that I’ve got it.
